price: 11. Mpe motindami moko te ayelaki bango sé batióla ye.
arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā yatīhim min rasūlin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
